original_title: Anura Kumara secures win in Badulla polling division
original_body_lines: The results of the Badulla polling division in Badulla District for the 2024 Presidential Election have been released by the Election Commission.
National People’s Power (NPP) candidate Anura Kumara Dissanayake received the highest number of votes in the Badulla polling division securing 17,983 votes.
